programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Runs the Café / Paddington Makes a Film) S1 (23/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Runs the Café / Paddington Makes a Film»Paddington says he will watch the cafe, so Matteo can play with Jonathan and Judy in the park. // Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a film camera to record his adventures in Windsor Gardens to send to Aunt Lucy in the retired home for Bears in Lima.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Finds a Pigeon / Paddington and the Chores List) S1 (1/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Finds a Pigeon / Paddington and the Chores List»A pigeon falls down the Brown family's chimney, and Paddington is going to take care of it ... Paddington, like the rest of the family, wants to do tasks. But ... can he?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'anniversaire d'Edmond l'éléphant) S3 (51/52)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire d'Edmond l'éléphant»Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La plus grande flaque de boue du monde) S3 (52/52)
programme.desc: «La plus grande flaque de boue du monde»Peppa and George wake up one morning to find that all the rain has made a flood, and their house is now a desert island!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Patata-Parc) S4 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Patata-Parc»Peppa and her family visit a new theme park: Potato City. There they discover that the magic of vegetables never ends. (Subtitled) (Audio Described) (Also in HD).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La nouvelle maison) S4 (2/52)
programme.desc: «La nouvelle maison»In this episode, Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see the home that he designed and Mr. Bull and his crew are building. They will help Mr. Bull and be surprised when they find out who their new neighbours are.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Une aventure requincroyable !) S6 (n°609)
programme.desc: «Une aventure requincroyable !»Zooli and her crew of Marine Biologists escort their new friends Baby Shark and his pilot fish William to visit Baby Shark's great-great-great-great-great Uncle Slow Mo, and help them escape the determined fisherman who's chasing them!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La grande fête de Blue) S2 (n°5)
programme.desc: «La grande fête de Blue»Show us your dance moves! Josh and Blue are having a dance party, and we play Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite dance. As we groove to find clues, we learn Magenta's favorite dance and help Bunny Jo learn a new dance!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Le restaurant de Blue) S2 (6/21)
programme.desc: «Le restaurant de Blue»Welcome to Blue's Bistro - a very fancy restaurant! While playing Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to eat, we help Josh take our friends' orders and skidoo to Farmer Goat's farm to retrieve fresh vegetables!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (L'anniversaire d'Anani) S2 (n°3)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire d'Anani»Lorelai is conflicted when invited to her older sister's birthday party because she's never felt she belonged in Merlandia. When Escarlata threatens to take over, Lorelai must accept her uniqueness as a strength or risk losing everything she loves.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Retour à Sirenia) S2 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Retour à Sirenia»Animated children's series following the adventures of a young pirate, Captain Santiago, and his mishmash of crewmates as they sail the high seas on spectacular quests.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Extreme Dodge Bubble) S2 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Extreme Dodge Bubble»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Rainy Day Roundup) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Rainy Day Roundup»The Rainy Day Round-Up: When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors. (S1, ep 13a).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Freeze Pops) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Freeze Pops»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le concours de danse / Une pieuvre farceuse) S8 (21/24)
programme.desc: «Le concours de danse / Une pieuvre farceuse»A dance contest being judged by Luke Stars goes wrong when a floating dancefloor carries the contestants away. // The pups investigate a mystery at an undersea-themed museum exhibit and discover an octopus that wants to return to the ocean.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Chooses a Best Friend) S1 (n°24)
programme.desc: «Paddington Chooses a Best Friend»A brand new version of a most familiar bear! A heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Delphine l'âne) S3 (12/52)
programme.desc: «Delphine l'âne»Peppa's French friend Delphine Donkey comes to stay. Peppa takes Delphine to daycare for a visit, where they teach her the 'Bing Bong Song', the class' favorite song to sing.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camion de pompier) S3 (13/52)
programme.desc: «Le camion de pompier»When Mummy Pig helps out at Miss Rabbit's fire station, she is called upon to douse the flames at Daddy Pig's out-of-control barbecue!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Princesse Peppa) S3 (14/52)
programme.desc: «Princesse Peppa»Mamie et Papy Cochon viennent pour un dîner avec maman et papa Cochon, mais Peppa et George sont trop fatigués pour aller au lit, jusqu'à ce qu'on leur racontent une histoire...

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Mystery Present) S1 (37/78)
programme.desc: «The Mystery Present»Bubu, Froga and Anna are looking for Anna's Ukulele, a bouncy ball and another item belonging to Froga. When searching, they find a beautiful present. Why is it here? Who is it for? What's inside? Our friends are planning to find out!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Friendship Bouquet) S1 (38/78)
programme.desc: «The Friendship Bouquet»Froga is devastated because her sunflowers have withered in her garden and she cannot make her annual sunflower bouquet. Luckily, Anna, with her friends, searches for a solution to replace Froga's cherished sunflowers with something better!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue fait de la pâtisserie) S2 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Blue fait de la pâtisserie»It's a nighttime game of Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite part of bedtime! As we search for clues, we help Blue and Polka Dots get clean, comfy, cozy and ready for bed.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Mr. Hellinger le Baby-Sitter / L'inauguration de la serre) S8 (22/24)
programme.desc: «Mr. Hellinger le Baby-Sitter / L'inauguration de la serre»Mayor Humdinger babysits his new friend's children, but trouble arises when they start feuding with his kitties. // When Mayor Goodway and Mayor Humdinger gets accidentally locked in a greenhouse and need rescued from an exotic plant inside.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Gare au pop-corn !) S2 (10/26)
programme.desc: «Gare au pop-corn !»When Chickaletta gets trapped in a Corn Field Maze, the PAW Patrol races to the rescue!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Cirque Cosmique / Au fond du gouffre) S2 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Cirque Cosmique / Au fond du gouffre»Sir Steel's circus takes Lady Fluffpot out of this world, can the Deer Squad bring her back to earth safely? // Bobbi gets carried away while digging for ground nuts and puts the forest and its residents in real danger.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Bonsoir, Platino-ville / Métalzilla) S1 (1/20)
programme.desc: «Bonsoir, Platino-ville / Métalzilla»Mr. Steel does not want to get out of bed and has Professor Sketch build a gigantic pair of sunglasses to block the sun. During a parade, Mr. Steel inflates his balloon in such a way that it disrupts the entire city.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Plant Problem / Paddington the Artist) S2 (1/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Plant Problem / Paddington the Artist»Paddington realizes he has been watering the wrong plant while Mr. Curry is away on holiday! // Mrs. Brown wants Windsor Gardens to artistically express themselves. Paddington doesn't know what art is, so he sets out to find what he's good at!

programme.title: Mini Chef (Bread) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Bread»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Boris / Né pour être sauvage) S1 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Boris / Né pour être sauvage»The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris? // Boris the elephant misses home. The Barbapapa decide to bring him back to Africa. On the spot, they help Boris to acclimatize.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barba TV / Le muséum) S1 (43/52)
programme.desc: «Barba TV / Le muséum»The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows. // The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution. On the program: creation of the Earth, Precambrian submarine and... dinosaurs!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le Fort de l'Aquamitié / La punaise d'eau) S2 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Le Fort de l'Aquamitié / La punaise d'eau»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le mot de passe secret) S2 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Le mot de passe secret»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Fixing Things) S1 (20/78)
programme.desc: «Fixing Things»Bubu catches a cold, he's unable to fix Ron's spinning top and Christopher's broken piano. While Bubu is resting, she "fixes" the broken items for him. Christopher's piano starts playing bubbles, Froga realizes she should leave the fixing to Bubu.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Leaf Portraits) S1 (n°39)
programme.desc: «Leaf Portraits»When Ron discovers that some leaves resemble his friends, like clouds are making shapes in the sky. Anna, Froga and Christopher are amazed by his discoveries. The leaves are blown away, and the wind takes the "Leaf Portraits".

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Froga's Choice) S1 (33/78)
programme.desc: «Froga's Choice»Froga can't decide which boots to wear for today's group photo with her friends. Anna, Ron, and Bubu try to help her decide, but it makes her decision-making more difficult!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Great Friendship Show) S1 (34/78)
programme.desc: «The Great Friendship Show»The Great Friendship Show: Anna and her friends write a poem. Bubu prefers to paint. And the friends do so too. Froga is not so keen on painting. For Ron, it's poetry. (S1, ep 34).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Remember-ator) S1 (35/78)
programme.desc: «The Remember-ator»Froga can't seem to remember anything today! Even her piano lesson with Christopher! S+he decides to put sticky notes all around the house as reminders. But it is not very convenient! Bubu offers to be her reminder, friends the best reminders of all!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Treasure Hunt) S1 (36/78)
programme.desc: «The Treasure Hunt»Froga organizes a treasure hunt for her friends! Everyone is enthusiastic, except Ron is not with them. Froga realises the treasure has now disappeared. When the treasure hunters have finally found Ron, they also found him..with the missing treasure!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Teddy Maternello) S3 (15/52)
programme.desc: «Teddy Maternello»Peppa brings home a teddy from daycare to look after, but she is worried that he will not have a very exciting time.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête des pirates de Danny) S3 (16/52)
programme.desc: «La fête des pirates de Danny»It is Danny Dog's birthday, and with the help of Granddad Dog and Grandpa Pig the children take part in a pirate treasure hunt.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La visite de monsieur Patate) S3 (17/52)
programme.desc: «La visite de monsieur Patate»Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le voyage en train) S3 (18/52)
programme.desc: «Le voyage en train»Madame Gazelle emmène Peppa et ses amis pour une balade en train, où elles devront cocher ce qu'elles voient sur leurs feuilles d'activité...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Mer, soleil et neige) S3 (30/52)
programme.desc: «Mer, soleil et neige»Peppa and her friends and family are looking forward to a trip to the beach where they can make sandcastles, but when they arrive at the beach there is too much snow!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'ordinateur de papy Pig) S3 (31/52)
programme.desc: «L'ordinateur de papy Pig»Mummy Pig gives her old PC to Granny and Grandpa Pig. Will they be able to use it?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'hôpital) S3 (32/52)
programme.desc: «L'hôpital»Peppa and her playgroup friends go with Madame Gazelle to visit Pedro Pony, who is in hospital with a broken leg.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Let Justice Be done) S1 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Let Justice Be done»Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbibul a un secret / Trop trop la classe) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Barbibul a un secret / Trop trop la classe»Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out. // The Barbapapa decide to save energy. But their efforts are undermined by Barbabright and Barbabelle who build a secret energy-consuming project.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Chocolat et boules de neige) S4 (12/20)
programme.desc: «Chocolat et boules de neige»It's a snowy day in Axle City, and every truck in town is lining up for a delicious winter warm-up: hot chocolate! But when Crusher tries to take all the hot chocolate for himself, Blaze is in hot pursuit to get it back!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La famille Pickle en camping) S4 (n°2)
programme.desc: «La famille Pickle en camping»When all the members of Pickle's family get lost in the woods, Pickle teams up with Tow Truck Blaze to come to their rescue!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le Super-secoueur / La ferme en folie) S8 (16/24)
programme.desc: «Le Super-secoueur / La ferme en folie»Farmer Al's harvest machine goes haywire and shakes up Adventure Bay, even threatening to rock the Lookout off its foundation. // Farmer Al has a wild dream that the Paw Patrol must rescue he and Yumi when his animals start acting like humans.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La forteresse en carton / L'île de Bill le grand pélican) S8 (17/24)
programme.desc: «La forteresse en carton / L'île de Bill le grand pélican»When Skye helps Traveling Travis search for Big Bill Island, the misguided explorer gets carried away by a really, really big bird.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Il faut sauver les abeilles / Le Canard Robot) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Il faut sauver les abeilles / Le Canard Robot»When the bees are in need, Bobbi takes action. Bees are important, and without them there are no flowers, no fruit, and no kaki flaps! Kai takes care of the ducklings but gets in trouble when he leaves that task to Robo-Duck.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (What's Up Lola) S2 (n°7)
programme.desc: «What's Up Lola»What's Up Lola: A bad mood crystal causes Lola and many animals to become unusually grumpy! Jade has to help Deer Squad to restore joy around Central Forest. (S2, ep 7b).

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Runs the Café / Paddington Makes a Film) S1 (23/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Runs the Café / Paddington Makes a Film»Paddington says he will watch the cafe, so Matteo can play with Jonathan and Judy in the park. // Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a film camera to record his adventures in Windsor Gardens to send to Aunt Lucy in the retired home for Bears in Lima.

programme.desc: «Paddington Finds a Pigeon / Paddington and the Chores List»A pigeon falls down the Brown family's chimney, and Paddington is going to take care of it ... Paddington, like the rest of the family, wants to do tasks. But ... can he?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'anniversaire d'Edmond l'éléphant) S3 (51/52)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire d'Edmond l'éléphant»Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.desc: «La plus grande flaque de boue du monde»Peppa and George wake up one morning to find that all the rain has made a flood, and their house is now a desert island!

programme.desc: «Extreme Dodge Bubble»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Rainy Day Roundup) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Rainy Day Roundup»The Rainy Day Round-Up: When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors. (S1, ep 13a).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Freeze Pops) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Freeze Pops»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le concours de danse / Une pieuvre farceuse) S8 (21/24)
programme.desc: «Le concours de danse / Une pieuvre farceuse»A dance contest being judged by Luke Stars goes wrong when a floating dancefloor carries the contestants away. // The pups investigate a mystery at an undersea-themed museum exhibit and discover an octopus that wants to return to the ocean.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Chooses a Best Friend) S1 (n°24)
programme.desc: «Paddington Chooses a Best Friend»A brand new version of a most familiar bear! A heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête foraine) S3 (24/52)
programme.desc: «La fête foraine»La famille va à la fête foraine, mais maman Cochon est en colère quand les gens à la foire lui disent qu'elle ne sera pas en mesure de gagner les prix en compétition.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les chiffres) S3 (25/52)
programme.desc: «Les chiffres»C'est l'anniversaire de Peppa. Tous ses amis sont invités à la fête. Papa Cochon s'apprête à faire un show extraordinaire pour l'occasion.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Un trou dans la route) S3 (26/52)
programme.desc: «Un trou dans la route»Peppa and her family are trying to get to the playground, but Mr Bull's roadworks are in the way.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (King for a Day) S1 (n°41)
programme.desc: «King for a Day»Today the friends play King For A Day, someone throws the crown on Christopher's head! Then the crown leaves his head and ends on his cousin, Benjy, who just came for a day visit. Benjy only wants to play with his cousin, and do whatever he wants.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Vegetable Pie) S1 (42/78)
programme.desc: «The Vegetable Pie»Froga's strawberries are sick so she's going to miss this year's vegetable picking. When Bubu offers her a walkie-talkie to use, she agrees to let him baby-sit her sick plant for her. But soon, Froga loses confidence in Bubu's ability to help.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches»The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue a beaucoup d'imagination) S2 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Blue a beaucoup d'imagination»Imagine along with Josh and Blue in this game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue envisions a mysterious shape to be. We listen to a story created by Slippery, Magenta and Tickety and help Mr. Salt discover his own imagination!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art) S9 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art»Julius loses his tooth and has a dream that the Paw Patrol saves a bumbling Tooth Fairy. // When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, the PAW Patrol must solve the Missing Art Mystery and return all the paintings.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Den Build Disaster / Winter Lights) S2 (19/20)
programme.desc: «Den Build Disaster / Winter Lights»Kai tries to impress with his super den, but his leaf blower invention frightens the baby animals. // Lola's plan to help a family of hedgehogs over the winter doesn't go to plan when Sir Steel wants to brighten things up.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le Poisson légendaire / Bulles à gogo) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Le Poisson légendaire / Bulles à gogo»When Ian is on holidays, Lola takes over as a park ranger for a day, but that is not easy. Mister Staal tries to clean Middenbos with a huge soap machine and creates one big bubble nightmare!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Celebrates Mrs Birds Day / Paddington the Table Tennis Champ!) S2 (4/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Celebrates Mrs Birds Day / Paddington the Table Tennis Champ!»It's Mrs. Bird Day & Paddington wants to make a cake with a Special jar of Marmalade but no one can open it - how will he show his appreciation? // Paddington & Mateo form a table tennis team and the beat the table hogs so everyone can play!

programme.title: Mini Chef (Banana) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Banana»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbidou ne sait pas dire non / Le sosie) S1 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Barbidou ne sait pas dire non / Le sosie»Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. // By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbidur n'est pas en forme / Patience Barbidur...) S1 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Barbidur n'est pas en forme / Patience Barbidur...»Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Danse à contre courant / Le Sorcier Glacé) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Danse à contre courant / Le Sorcier Glacé»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Best Fin-Ship Day) S1 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Best Fin-Ship Day»Best Fin-Ship Day: Baby Shark tries to give William the best Best Fin-ship Day ever. (S1, ep 17a).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (King for a Day) S1 (n°41)
programme.desc: «King for a Day»Today the friends play King For A Day, someone throws the crown on Christopher's head! Then the crown leaves his head and ends on his cousin, Benjy, who just came for a day visit. Benjy only wants to play with his cousin, and do whatever he wants.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Give-Away Day) S1 (45/78)
programme.desc: «Give-Away Day»Froga gets a new beautiful Sunflower Plant and decides to put it in her greenhouse. But she realizes that has been using her greenhouse to store all the items she doesn't know what to do with anymore. Now there's no room for her plant!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Mystery Present) S1 (37/78)
programme.desc: «The Mystery Present»Bubu, Froga and Anna are looking for Anna's Ukulele, a bouncy ball and another item belonging to Froga. When searching, they find a beautiful present. Why is it here? Who is it for? What's inside? Our friends are planning to find out!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Friendship Bouquet) S1 (38/78)
programme.desc: «The Friendship Bouquet»Froga is devastated because her sunflowers have withered in her garden and she cannot make her annual sunflower bouquet. Luckily, Anna, with her friends, searches for a solution to replace Froga's cherished sunflowers with something better!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Leaf Portraits) S1 (n°39)
programme.desc: «Leaf Portraits»When Ron discovers that some leaves resemble his friends, like clouds are making shapes in the sky. Anna, Froga and Christopher are amazed by his discoveries. The leaves are blown away, and the wind takes the "Leaf Portraits".

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Vegetable Pie) S1 (42/78)
programme.desc: «The Vegetable Pie»Froga's strawberries are sick so she's going to miss this year's vegetable picking. When Bubu offers her a walkie-talkie to use, she agrees to let him baby-sit her sick plant for her. But soon, Froga loses confidence in Bubu's ability to help.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Mer, soleil et neige) S3 (30/52)
programme.desc: «Mer, soleil et neige»Peppa and her friends and family are looking forward to a trip to the beach where they can make sandcastles, but when they arrive at the beach there is too much snow!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'ordinateur de papy Pig) S3 (31/52)
programme.desc: «L'ordinateur de papy Pig»Mummy Pig gives her old PC to Granny and Grandpa Pig. Will they be able to use it?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'hôpital) S3 (32/52)
programme.desc: «L'hôpital»Peppa and her playgroup friends go with Madame Gazelle to visit Pedro Pony, who is in hospital with a broken leg.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les fruits) S4 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Les fruits»Fruit: It is fruit day at the supermarket, and Miss Rabbit is making fruit smoothies.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'hélicoptère de mademoiselle Rabbit) S3 (34/52)
programme.desc: «L'hélicoptère de mademoiselle Rabbit»Miss Rabbit takes Peppa and her family for a ride in her rescue helicopter.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Bébé Alexandre) S3 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Bébé Alexandre»Baby Alexander is too young to talk, until Peppa teaches him his first word.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le phare de Papy Rabbit) S3 (36/52)
programme.desc: «Le phare de Papy Rabbit»Granddad Dog takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbit's lighthouse.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Double Dare You) S1 (33/52)
programme.desc: «Double Dare You»On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barba TV / Le muséum) S1 (43/52)
programme.desc: «Barba TV / Le muséum»The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows. // The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution. On the program: creation of the Earth, Precambrian submarine and... dinosaurs!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Super-constructeurs, super-sauveurs) S4 (13/20)
programme.desc: «Super-constructeurs, super-sauveurs»Blaze, Starla and Stripes transform into construction vehicles to help Pauline build her pizza parlor. Crusher and Pickle also get to work; they build a high tower.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La fonte du glacier) S4 (4/20)
programme.desc: «La fonte du glacier»When a little bunny gets trapped on top of a melting glacier, Blaze must put his new robot powers to the test as he races to the rescue.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le cygne gonflable / Le lav'animaux) S8 (23/24)
programme.desc: «Le cygne gonflable / Le lav'animaux»The Goodways drift out to sea on a swan shaped float and need rescued from a flock of real swans aiming to protect the giant inflatable. // Mayor Humdinger steals Katie's Portable Pet Wash and ends up causing bubble trouble all over town.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a Lonesome Walrus / Pups Save the Hummy Gummies) S8 (n°24)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a Lonesome Walrus / Pups Save the Hummy Gummies»Everybody loves Helga Humdinger's Hummy Gummy treats, causing Mayor Humdinger to get jealous and steal them all.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Kai Express / Ducknado) S1 (4/15)
programme.desc: «Kai Express / Ducknado»When Kai joins all the deer's carts together, the vehicles end up as a runaway train in the Central Forest! // Sir Steel's super powerful hairdryer creates a giant tornado that sucks up Ian, his ducklings and a heap of other things.
